name: eqvreleq

⊢ (c0 = c1 →(EqvRel(c0)↔ EqvRel(c1)))
⊣ (c0 = c1 →((RefRel(c0)∧ SymRel(c0)∧ TrRel(c0))↔(RefRel(c1)∧ SymRel(c1)∧ TrRel(c1))))
⊣ (EqvRel(c0)↔(RefRel(c0)∧ SymRel(c0)∧ TrRel(c0)))
⊣ (EqvRel(c1)↔(RefRel(c1)∧ SymRel(c1)∧ TrRel(c1)))
